title: [Whistler's Pass, Tunnel]
description: A thick vein of clear quartz crystal runs the length of one wall, flooding the room with sharply refracted moonlight carried from the surface to the center of the peak.  Any night vision you had developed in the tunnel instantly disappears.

A thick vein of clear quartz crystal runs the length of one wall, flooding the room with sharp white light carried from the surface to the heart of the mountain.  Any night vision you had developed in the tunnel instantly disappears.
